Package fr.umlv.drawer

Interface Drawer

All Known Implementing Classes:
Baba, BabaWord, DefeatWord, DrawIcons, DrawWord, Empty, Flag, FlagWord, IsWord, PushWord, Rock, RockWord, SinkWord, Skull, SkullWord, StopWord, Wall, WallWord, Water, WaterWord, WinWord, YouWord
public interface Drawer
Drawer is the class responsable of the items design
